name: Ascent (itch) (Cr1ticality, bladeprincess)
description: Scythe, survive, rise. Decimate the masses to prove yourself as a newborn, blood-soaked arena god. Welcome to Ascent, your new favorite roguelike. For weapons, you’ll take two blade types and some stat bonuses on every kill. And your enemies? Well, they’ll never stop coming and they’re only getting stronger. Good hunting, soldier.
